onActionLogIn(ActionEvent) - Method in class DBClientApplication.Controller.LogInController
onActionLogIn is a method that validates a users username and password, checks for upcoming appointments withing 15 minutes, and assigns the user and ID, before taking the user to the 'Appointments' screen.

onActionRecords takes the user from the current screen to the 'Records' screen.

onActionSignOut(ActionEvent) - Method in class DBClientApplication.Controller.AppointmentController
onActionSignOut takes the user from the current screen and takes them to the 'LogIn' form.
onActionSubmit(ActionEvent) - Method in class DBClientApplication.Controller.UpdateAppointmentController
onActionSubmit checks for business hours and customer overlap, then updates the appointment information in the database, before taking the user to 'Appointment' screen.
onActionUpdateAppointment(ActionEvent) - Method in class DBClientApplication.Controller.AppointmentController
onActionUpdateAppointment defines a selected appointment in the calendar and takes the user to 'UpdateAppointment' form.
onActionUpdateCustomer(ActionEvent) - Method in class DBClientApplication.Controller.RecordsController
onActionUpdateCustomer checks and passes for a selected record, then takes the user to the' UpdateCustomer' screen.
onActionUpdateRecord(ActionEvent) - Method in class DBClientApplication.Controller.UpdateCustomerController
onActionUpdateRecord is a method that checks for empty inputs and takes the user to 'Records' after updating the database.
onActionViewAll(ActionEvent) - Method in class DBClientApplication.Controller.AppointmentController
onActionViewAll provides a third toggle button in the toggle group for the default display of all appointments.
openConnection() - Static method in class DBClientApplication.Helper.JDBC
a method to maintain an open connection.
